name: XCTMutableIssue
desc: A mutable object that represents a test failure, and includes source code call stacks for test reporting and investigation.

items.name: var type: XCTIssueReference.IssueType
items.desc: A value for classifying an issue that occurs during testing.

items.name: var compactDescription: String
items.desc: A concise description of the issue with no transient data, suitable for use in test run summaries and results aggregation across multiple test runs.

items.name: var detailedDescription: String?
items.desc: A detailed description of the issue that may include transient data, such as numbers, object identifiers, and timestamps, to help diagnose the issue.

items.name: var sourceCodeContext: XCTSourceCodeContext
items.desc: The source code location for the issue, including the filename, line number, and call stack.

items.name: var associatedError: Error?
items.desc: An optional error to associate with a test issue.

items.name: var attachments: [XCTAttachment]
items.desc: An array of data that augments an issue, such as files, images, screenshots, data blobs, or ZIP files.

items.name: func add(XCTAttachment)
items.desc: Adds supporting data to an issue.
